metadata.dc:title: Impact of social media on suicide rates
metadata.dc:creator: Martin Winkler (https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8811-8043)
metadata.dc:subject: Correlation analysis of percentual change in Social media users (Facebook and Twitter) and golbal suicide rates
metadata.dc:description: A set of tools that enables correlation analysis of the percentual change in Social media users (Facebook and Twitter) and golbal suicide rates including dataset creation, from input datasets, and visual and numeric correlation analysis.
